item.title: Ada for the curious
item.description: This post is for developers who are curious about Ada. Contrary to some associations you might have (ðŸ¦•?), Ada is a modern language, with modules, a strong type system, and easy-to-use concurrency. It’s blazing fast (ðŸš€!), backed by a cool community, and it’s easy to learn. Instead of giving an extensive introduction to syntax you can easily look up yourself, I want to highlight some of the aspects that make Ada worth looking into.
